data.title: Length of a Racetrack
data.statement: You are given a list of points a racetrack is going through. A racetrack always ends at the start point (first given point). Calculate the length of the racetrack.
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read x:int y:int
write length of racetrack
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: An integer [[n]] for number of points.
<<Following n Lines:>> The coordinates of the point [[x]] and [[y]].
data.outputDescription: <<One Line:>> A double length of the racetrack (rounded to 3 decimals).

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a list of points a racetrack is going through. A racetrack always ends at the start point (first given point). Calculate the length of the racetrack.
Input
Line 1: An integer n for number of points.
Following n Lines: The coordinates of the point x and y.
Output
One Line: A double length of the racetrack (rounded to 3 decimals).
Constraints
n < 10;
x < 100;
y < 100;
Example
Input
2
5 6
3 4
Output
5.657
